dmca.title: Mayuri Audio Complains to Google of Multiple "Bollywood" Site Infringements
dmca.body:
LAW OFFICE OF
[private]
Admitted in New York

BY FAX: [private]

February 27, 2004

Attn: Copyright Violations
Google Inc.
[private]
Mountain View, CA  94043

Re: Notice of Copyright infringement

Dear Sir or Madam;

I am the Attorney retained by Mayuri Audio (firm) and Ushakiron Movies, a film production company, with respect to their infringement of copyright titled "Tujhe Meri Kasam".

Mayuri Audio is the copyright holder and owners of the Music, Lyrics and Sound of the motion picture titled "Tujhe Meri Kasam
